DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect consume various lentil variety mixed-meals ( contain either white rice white potato ) post-prandial blood glucose insulin compare white rice white potato alone .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Lentil Consumption Post-prandial Blood Glucose Insulin
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible participant undergo total 6 study visit . During visit , fast blood sample take fingerprick , approximately 500µL blood drip collection tube . The participant consume meal either : white bread , white rice ( white potato ) , white rice lentil ( white potato lentil ) . White bread consume first study visit rest meal take place random order visit follow . Each meal provide total 50g available carbohydrate . Six blood sample take fingerprick 15 , 30 , 45 , 60 , 90 120 minute begin meal .
DOC.criteria: Healthy men woman Age 1840 year BMI 2030 kg/m2 Tobacco use Pregnant breastfeeding Fasting blood glucose ≥ 7.0 mmol/L Any major medical condition include history AIDS hepatitis Medical surgical event require hospitalization within 3 month randomization Any medication except stable dose ( 3 month ) oral contraceptive , blood pressure statin medication Blood pressure > 140/90 mm Hg Natural health product ( NHPs ) use glycemic control Probiotic supplement Dietary fibre supplement Consumption > 4 serving pulse per week Food allergy nonfood life threaten allergy Shift worker Alcohol consumption > 14 drinks/week > 4 drinks/sitting Recent intend significant weight loss gain ( > 4 kg previous 3 month ) Elite athlete
